scripts.test: npm run clean:allure-results && npx cucumber-js --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --require-module ts-node/register --require src/features/**/*.ts --require src/support/**/*.ts --require tests/support/**/*.ts tests/features/*.feature
scripts.test:tag: npm run clean:allure-results && npx cucumber-js --format allure-cucumberjs/reporter --require-module ts-node/register --require src/features/**/*.ts --require src/support/**/*.ts --require tests/support/**/*.ts --tags $TAG tests/features/*.feature
